item.description:

if(((itemUsed == 2394) || (otherItem == 2394)) && ((itemUsed == 2128) || (otherItem == 2128))){ deleteItem(2394, 1); deleteItem(2128, 1); addItem(739, 1); } Basically I need a code explanation...
